hero.title: Konekte. Kolabore. Kree.
hero.subtitle: Social Colab enn platform kot nou pa pran okenn komisyon. Wi: 0% komisyon lor bann kolaborasyon ant bann mark ek bann inflianserr lokal.

whatWeAre.title: Ki Nou Ete
whatWeAre.p1: Isi lor nou platform Social Colab, nou kwar dan promosyon bann relasyon direk, transparan, ek prodiktif. Se pou sa ki nou finn konstrir premye platform 0% komisyon dan Moris, ki konekte bann mark lokal avek enn kominote kreaterr verifye. Nou model li sinp: ou pey pou plan-la, pa koneksion-la. Pena okenn fre kasiet, pena okenn poursantaz bidze ou kanpagn ki no mett dan poss. Zis enn labonnman sinp e previzib.
whatWeAre.p2: Sa lapros-la permet bann mark maximiz zot depans marketing e permett bann kreaterr gard 100% zot reveni. Nou panse ki se enn 'win-win' ki pou ankouraz bann partenarya pli otantik dan enn lekonomi kreatif pli solid pou nou ti-zil.

features.title: Nou Ena Bann Zouti Lantelizans Artifisyel Pou Tou Dimoun
features.subtitle: Ki ou enn bizness ki pe grandi so mark, ouswa enn inflianserr pe rod bon partenarya, nou platform donn zot bann zouti ki bizin pou reysi.

brands.title: Servi Lantelizans Artifisyel
brands.description: Arete perdi letan. Nou sistem intelizan konekte ou mark avek bann inflanserr ki zot lodyans koresponn avek ou sib demografik.

brands.title: Zere Ou Bann Kanpagn San Traka
brands.description: Depi koumansman ziska fin, zere tou ou kanpagn depi enn sel plas. Nou zouti integre fer kolaborasyon vinn fasil.

brands.title: Analiz Anplas
brands.description: Swiv performans lor tablo-de-bor: ROI, nivo langazman, ek krwasans followers pou kapav ajiste ou stratezi.

creators.title: Dekouver Bann Mark Otantik
creators.description: Konekte avek bann mark ki alinye avek ou valer ek stil konteni. Trouv partenarya solid ek dirab.

creators.title: Montre To Potansyel
creators.description: Kree enn profil profesyonnel (kouma enn media kit): met ou meyer travay ek done demografik lodyans pou atir bann mark.

creators.title: Fer Bann Deal An Sekirite
creators.description: Zerr propozisyon, kontra ek peyman dan enn sel plas. Nou sistem asir to peyman ar ler, sak fwa.

showcase.title: Zwenn Nou Bann Kreaterr
showcase.subtitle: Dekouverr bann talan ki kapav fer to mark rezone.

jobs.title: Kanpagn Aktif
jobs.subtitle: Enn seleksyon lokazion pou kolabor avek bann gran mark Morisyin.

pricing.title: Swazir To Plan
pricing.subtitle: Pricing sinp ek transparan. Okenn fre kasiet. GARANTI !

tiers.name: GRATIS
features: Akse limite lor nou set zouti

tiers.name: STANDARD
tiers.description: Pou bann bizness ki pe grandi ek bann inflianserr
features: Akse a tou nou bann set zouti

tiers.name: PRO
tiers.description: Pou bann bizness ki pe grandi ek bann inflianserr

testimonials.title: Bann Mark ek Inflianserr Satisfet
testimonials.subtitle: A la seki nou bann itilizaterr pe dir lor Social Colab.

cta.title: Pare Pou Grandi To Mark?
cta.subtitle: Rezwenn nou lor nou platform azordi mem. Annou koumans enn partenarya solid ki amenn vre rezilta.

footer.tagline: Nou konekte bann mark ek bann inflianserr lokal pou kree bann kanpagn ki kraz partou.

betaWelcome.title: Bienvini lor Social Colab Beta!
betaWelcome.description:
Nou bien kontan ki ou la! Zis pou informe ki nou platform aktyelman anba test beta. Nou pe travay for pou ameyor servis la ek ou feedback bien presie pou nou.

Pou rezon test, konteni ki ou pe truve la finn eter zennere ar fos done. Nou pou azout bann vre dimounn ek mark la mezir ki zot anrezistre.
